sqlReaderQuery.value:
select WATERMARK_DATETIME 
from [dbo].[WATERMARK] 
where OWNER_NAME = '@{variables('ADF_OWNER_NAME')}'
and TABLE_NAME = '@{variables('Table_Generic')}'

select WATERMARK_DATETIME 
from [dbo].[WATERMARK] 
where OWNER_NAME = '@{variables('ADF_OWNER_NAME')}'
and TABLE_NAME = '@{variables('Table_GL_IMPORT_REFERENCES')}'
